entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 1:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle or showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
